text: Uri Savir (; 7 January 1953 â€“ 14 May 2022) was an Israeli politician and diplomat. He was born in Jerusalem, Israel. He was a member of the Centre Party and New Way. From 1999 to 2001, he was a member of the Knesset. From 2001 until 2005, he was the Ambassador to Eritrea.Uri Savir: Particulars Knesset website He was the chief negotiator of the Oslo Accords. Savir died on 14 May 2022 at the age of 69.Uri Savir, chief peace negotiator of Oslo Accords, dies at 69 ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Israel Category:Politicians from Jerusalem Category:Members of the Knesset
title: Uri Savir
